tool_description: Calculates comprehensive cart metrics including total value, discount impact, tax estimates, and revenue projections for abandonment analysis.
error_messages: Invalid cart_items: Must contain valid product identifiers
Invalid quantities: Must contain positive integers matching cart_items length
Mismatched arrays: cart_items and quantities must have same length
Product not found: One or more product IDs are invalid
Invalid user_location: Must be a valid country/region code
usage: Calculate cart values by providing cart_items, corresponding quantities, and optionally user_location for accurate tax estimates.

subtotal.description: Cart subtotal before taxes and discounts

average_item_value.description: Average value per item in cart

revenue_potential.description: Revenue potential category: low, medium, high
